## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please confirm:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] Tool meets all inclusion criteria
- [ ] Free tier details are specific and accurate
- [ ] Link is working and goes to the official website
- [ ] Tool is placed in the correct category
- [ ] Description is clear and concise (under 150 characters)
- [ ] No affiliate or referral links included
- [ ] No promotional language used
- [ ] Grammar and spelling are correct
- [ ] Changes are alphabetically ordered (if applicable)
